channel.itunes:subtitle: Stay up to date with the Nextcloud community!
channel.itunes:summary: The Nextcloud Podcast interviews Nextcloud community members, contributors, users and others, keeping you up to date on what is happening.

channel.itunes:keywords: Nextcloud, open source, self-hosting, cloud, community, programming, privacy, security

item.title: Frank Karlitschek on remote working
item.itunes:subtitle: Our third episode is a conversation about remote work with Nextcloud CEO Frank Karlitschek.
item.itunes:summary: On our third podcast, host Ingo discusses working remote with Nextcloud CEO Frank Karlitschek. Nextcloud is a company centered around remote work, hiring the best and most motivated people wherever they live. With some team members as far from our Stuttgart office as Hawaii and Cape Verde force us to work efficiently across time zones and vast distances. Frank and Ingo cover the what, why and how of working remotely, and discuss how Nextcloud itself is an important tool in how we collaborate.
item.description: On our third podcast, host Ingo discusses working remote with Nextcloud CEO Frank Karlitschek. Nextcloud is a company centered around remote work, hiring the best and most motivated people wherever they live. With some team members as far from our Stuttgart office as Hawaii and Cape Verde force us to work efficiently across time zones and vast distances. Frank and Ingo cover the what, why and how of working remotely, and discuss how Nextcloud itself is an important tool in how we collaborate.
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Part two of our conversation with Nextcloud designer, Jan
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode we continue our conversation and turn towards the subject of design.
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we continue our conversation and turn towards the subject of design.
item.description: In this episode we continue our conversation and turn towards the subject of design. What is design, how does Nextcloud do it and why is it so important?
item.itunes:author: Nextcloud

item.title: Welcome to our first Nextcloud Podcast!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this episode we introduce the Nextcloud Podcast.
item.itunes:summary: In this very first episode we introduce our podcast, discussing with Nextcloud designer and community manager Jan Christoph Borchardt what our podcast will be covering going forward.
